title: Inside UNC's Million-Dollar Soda Addiction
firstLine: As the cash registers continue to ring up sales, a chilling new report reveals that UNC's vending machines are siphoning off millions of dollars annually.

title: Campus Unorganizing

firstLine: With just weeks to go before Election Day, the North Carolina Democratic Party has launched an all-out effort to mobilize the state's vast army of college students, who could hold the key to victory.

source: Copy of Campus preparedness story - Alex Kreidler
firstLine: In a bombshell report, UNC's emergency coordinators have spoken out about their shocking lack of training and preparedness for the university's response to major incidents.
